name: Stormy Skies Earrings
description:
Gorgeous sky blue and flashing gray gemstones make for a stormy pair of earrings. Pale blue angelite beads are paired with pearlstone (larvikite) beads for just the right combination of colors. Sterling silver accent beads complete the picture. Measuring 2 inches (5 cm) these earrings finish with decorative sterling silver ear wires.

The last two pictures show coordinating pieces that are listed separately. 
They can also be viewed in our Bracelets and Necklace sections.

All of our jewelry arrives with a complimentary anti-tarnish pouch to keep it looking great. We also offer gift boxing which can be purchased separately.

name: Stormy Skies Bracelet
description:
Gorgeous sky blue and flashing gray gemstones make for a stormy bracelet. Pale blue angelite beads are paired with pearlstone (larvikite) beads for just the right combination of colors. Sterling silver accent beads complete the picture. Measuring 7 1/2 inches (19 cm) this bracelet finishes with a sterling silver toggle clasp.

All of our jewelry arrives with a complimentary anti-tarnish pouch to keep it looking great. We also offer gift boxing which can be purchased separately. Need a different length- just contact us and we can remake many of our items to suit your needs.

#5180

name: Stormy Skies Necklace
description:
Gorgeous sky blue and flashing gray gemstones make for a stormy necklace. Pale blue angelite beads are paired with pearlstone (larvikite) beads for just the right combination of colors. Sterling silver accent beads complete the picture. Measuring 16 3/4 inches ( 42.5 cm) this necklace finishes with a hook style clasp.

All of our jewelry arrives with a complimentary anti-tarnish pouch to keep it looking great. We also offer gift boxing which can be purchased separately. Need a different length- just contact us and we can remake many of our items to suit your needs.
